description:
With barely enough time to stop the dark entity that’s after him, Trunks travels back to the past. But when he arrives, can present Trunks handle seeing his future self?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Es gibt wieder Hoffnung! – Öffne deine Augen im Jetzt, Trunks!
HOPE[きぼう]!! 再び 現在[いま]で目覚めよトランクス
Hope!! Once More Awaken in the Present, Trunks
Kibou!! Futatabi: Ima de Mezameyo Trunks
